div.bibl: Naujienos, Vol. I, No. 39, Aug. 19, 1914. CHICAGO NEWS -- DON'T FORGET TO REGISTER

body.p: Tomorrow, August 19th, every citizen should register at the polling place in his precinct. If you don't register you will not be able to vote on September 9th. Every vote is very important; therefore we ask you not to lose your vote. Be sure to register tomorrow at your polling place.
